directions.step:
Mix the flour and salt and sugar together. Cut in the shortening and add enough ice water to make a stiff dough. Beat your dough with a mallet until it is smooth, folding frequently. Takes about 20 mins then roll out the dough, cut with a small cookie cutter or tin can rim. Bake these for 30 mins in a 375 degree oven. If desired dust these with some powdered sugar. Makes 20 small biscuits or cookies.
